title: Free Temp Skin bug (found reason)
body: If you own a champion and you have a skin unlocked.(lets say the third skin unlocked.) and you trade with someone for another champ and you don't have skins for the traded one. You will unlock the third skin for that game only.

replies.body:
Hey ravenxharuno, 

Thanks for the report! You're right that it had to do with trading in the new champion select. This issue should be resolved.
